name: Ultimate Surfing Buddy!
description: Can only be played when there are at least a total of 2 Summons on the field (Both sides' Summons count): Randomly triggers an End Phase effect of one of yours' and the opponent's Summons.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Can only be played when there are at least a total of 2 Summons on the field (Both sides' Summons count):</color> Randomly triggers an End Phase effect of one of yours' and the opponent's Summons.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Can only be played when there are at least a total of 2 Summons on the field (Both sides' Summons count):</color> Randomly triggers an End Phase effect of one of yours' and the opponent's Summons.
storytext: "Just find yourself a good swell, pick up a suitable surfboard, and you too can experience the joys of surfing whenever you want!"
